name: Scourge of Tethys
description:
A human base on Tethys is under attack by aliens and it's up to you to stop them!
Shoot the aliens to increase your score and survive for as long as you can!

Supports Windows, Mac, Linux and Android (4+ only)!
Now with controller support!

Keyboard Controls

  • Z to shoot
  • X to bomb
  • P to pause
  • M to mute
  • Arrow keys to move

Gamepad Controls

  • A to shoot
  • B to bomb
  • Start to pause
  • X to mute
  • Dpad/Analog stick to move

Android Controls

  • Z to shoot
  • X to bomb
  • S to pause
  • Tap music note to mute
  • Touch and drag on "movement area" to move

Version 1.05

  • Enemies now have animation
  • Each round completed gives a score bonus
  • Adjusted enemy difficulty
  • Additional enemies spawn per round
  • Time between enemies spawning reduced per round
  • Shooters fire lasers individually
  • Fixed pause bug
